channel.title: Can someone give me some basic syntax for Delta dialogues?
channel.description:
I would appreciate if you could give me a simple example of how:
1) 1-4 line dialogues are written
2) 1-4 statement (Just the chatbox with words in it, no character or NPC heads) dialogues are written
3) itemOnInterface (chatbox with item on it and text)
Thanks.

item.title: Can someone give me some basic syntax for Delta dialogues?
